mapper.sql: UUID, sys_empUUID, OPERTIME, STOREUUID, GOODSUUID, NUM, TYPE
mapper.select: select a.UUID,b.`NAME` sys_empUUID,DATE_FORMAT(a.OPERTIME,'%Y-%m-%d ') as OPERTIME ,c.`NAME` STOREUUID, d.`NAME` GOODSUUID ,a.NUM,a.TYPE from storeoper a,sys_emp b,store c,goods d where a.sys_empUUID=b.UUID and a.STOREUUID=c.UUID and a.GOODSUUID=d.UUID and b.NAME like concat('%',#{sysEmpUuid},'%') and c.NAME like concat('%',#{storeName},'%') and d.NAME like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into storeoper (UUID, sys_empUUID, OPERTIME, STOREUUID, GOODSUUID, NUM, TYPE) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysEmpuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opertime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{storeuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into storeoper
UUID,
sys_empUUID,
OPERTIME,
STOREUUID,
GOODSUUID,
NUM,
TYPE,
#{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sysEmpuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{opertime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{storeuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update storeoper
sys_empUUID = #{sysEmpuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=DATE},
STOREUUID = #{storeuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODSUUID = #{goodsuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update storeoper set sys_empUUID = #{sysEmpuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=DATE}, STOREUUID = #{storeuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODSUUID = #{goodsuuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
